title: The Unexamined Life - Socratic Philosophy
author: Socrates (via Plato and Xenophon)
source: Classical sources including Plato's Apology, Phaedo, and Xenophon's Memorabilia
key_concepts: The unexamined life is not worth living
I know that I know nothing
relevance: Foundational text for Western philosophy, establishing the importance of rational inquiry and self-examination
